column3: utACK. That's what I get for trying to be too clever....\n

FYI, I'm still seeing intermittent deadlocks in `test_bitcoin`, even in [`v0.11.0`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/v0.11.0). I'll see if I can get a dump from `gdb --pid "$( pidof test_bitcoin )"` the next time I observe it.\n

Hmmm, I'm only seeing occasional deadlocks in `v0.11.0` with debugging symbols removed (e.g., via `eu-strip .../bin/test_bitcoin`). They may also happen with a binary whose debugging symbols are intact, but I haven't observed that (yet).

Here's what I found:

``` sh
% eu-strip -f .../bin/test_bitcoin.debug .../bin/test_bitcoin
% # Run test_bitcoin in another shell and wait for it to hang
%
Yes, could be that there is another deadlock. Haven't noticed one myself yet, though, not even on travis.\n

@laanwj, are you running binaries with or without debugging symbols in your Travis builds? As I mentioned. I have not yet seen this deadlock happen with a binary with debugging symbols. FYI, I filed #6540 to track this further.\n
